data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: Nice pizza, can order by slice or whole pie.  Nice selection of slices ready to go when you arrive.  Dine in or dine out.

data.title: Great pizza and friendly staff
data.text: Stopped by for dinner after a day spent on the beach on the long-weekend trip to San Diego. The girl behind the counter was really nice and friendly; we ordered La Rocco Special pizza and couple of large cannolis. Despite us being super hungry, we couldn't possibly finish the pizza between the two of us so we packed the leftovers to go. Pizza was really good, made with fresh ingredients and crust was just right. We enjoyed their outdoor seating area as the inside was full. I personally liked the cannolis, but my husband wasn't a fan. Regardless, if we are in the area, we will be back for some good pizza.

data.title: Excellent Pizza Pie!
data.text:
My boyfriend and I were craving pizza and stumbled across La Rocco's. And Im glad we found this place.

I am a native New Yorker and I have grown up with real NY Pizza. So I am VERY picky when it comes to pizza and skeptical of places that advertise " NY style pizza". Its very hard to find that distinct taste and texture of real the real thing.

However...La Rocco's is hands down, pretty darn close to the real thing! This pizza was amazing!! 
I will be back again! It has become my new favorite pizza joint. They have got the New York flavor down. YUM!!

The place itself looks small from the outside, but has a big seating area in the back, there is seating in the storefront area and also outside. We had our dog kids, so we sat on the outdoor patio. Its clean, smells good. Nice staff and clean bathrooms. They have a large selection of pizzas, something for everyones taste.

Good stuff, go eat some. Skip the other places around, they wont compare to La Rocco's!

data.title: Very close to the true italian pizza!
data.text: Very close to the true italian pizza! We had margherita and spinach tomatoes mushrooms and onion. the ingredients were fresh and the crust was perfect!

data.title: Excellent New York Pizza in San Clemente
data.text: Always love stopping by La Rocco's Pizzeria, they have the closest pizza to what you can get in NY.  They have different varieties that are all excellent. The pricing is fair, and the guys behind the counter are really nice. Recommend them.

data.title: One of 3 best pizza places in San CLemente.
data.text: La Rocco's has really good pizza and is one of the few places you can buy it by the slice. Little to no atmosphere, because it's mostly a take-out place, but there are a few tables outside, in the front, and also in a back room. One of the better slices in South County

data.title: YUM!
data.text: This place is so good. The young man who was at the counter was personable and friendly. The pizza I had for lunch was so delicious I returned for dinner later in the week during my stay. They have salads ready to go so its easy to get dinner in a hurry. This is perfect for family as you can all order your own variety slice.

data.title: Great for variety
data.text:
We love to go to La Rocco's as a family becasue of there by the slice option.  They have so many different thin crust NY style varieties.  The special is a good option if you are looking for a good taste or variety pie is the perfect fit if you won't 8 slices.  Ihefront has two table but the back has additional space for sitting down.  It is also very convenient to call ahead and bring home.  

It does get busy but they are able to quickly move people through.  Pay attention to each item for there extras on request.  Taco Pizza is nice to add the after heating cold trimmings (lettuce tomato, and sou cream) but you need to remind them to do it.

data.title: White cheese and anchovies - favorite!
data.text: White cheese with anchovies! Yum! Other pizza specialties really really good! A mainstay with us for pizza!

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: amazing new york style pizza, always used to come here for the lunch special of 2 slices and a drink. the white stone and bronx are some of my favorites

data.title: Delish!
data.text: Thin crust, NY style pizza with fun names and great taste! Loved the Whitestone - a white pizza with mozzerella and ricotta. The pepperoni was pretty tasty too! Wish I had a La Rocco's in my town!

data.title: New York Style
data.text: This is the best New York Style pizza in SoCal.  The counter service is very casual, and the food is very consistent. You can't go wrong here.

data.title: Why ?
data.text: Why is this pizza place so highly rated ? Why is the counter help so rude and incompetent ? Why does a tiny slice of pepperoni cost $4.00 +tax ? Why is the dining area so filthy ? Why would I ever go back ?

data.title: Take out
data.text: Visiting from the east coast I was a bit hesitant to try LaRoccos.  After reading the reviews my husband and I decided to order take out. We are so glad we did. Very authentic NY pizza.  Many choices but we went with our old standby-pepperoni and mushroom. There is casual seating for dining there but we took our pizza to go. Loved it and can't wait to go back.

data.title: Great NY Pizza in CA
data.text: This place is a must. I grew up in the Northeast and this is like the best NYC pie you can find around these parts. While there are some great brick oven places, this is the real NYC deal.

data.title: Family favorite
data.text: For some reason this is in my bf name but la Rocco's pizzeria is my all time favorite wen I visit California. My son lives In Santa Ana but each time I visit we make the drive to eat here love the atmosphere n my boys love it to we have been visiting la Rocco's since my boys were 13 n 18 !

data.title: A Great Place for Unique Pizza By the Slice
data.text: We love to come here to pick up 5-6 slices of various, innovative pizzas and a salad.  The place is small, but they always seem to have 12 or so different types of pizza available by the slice.  Of course you can order a whole pizza, or two, if you like.  But we really enjoy the opportunity for the variety available.  My somewhat older Mom, who long ago wearied of the standard pepperoni or cheese pizzas found elsewhere, loves that variety -- and here current favorite is the Puttanesca.

data.title: great thin crust pizza
data.text: take out dinner tonight.  surprisingly huge pie, nice thin and crispy crust (just like i like).  phoned in order and it was done when i arrived, about 15 minutes.   the place is small with  limited indoor and out side seating, and busy.  lots of choices, pizza by the slice and salads.  it didn't get 5 stars due to very little parking and pie could use more marinara sauce, my opinion.  These guys show great U.S. soldier pride, offering 25% off to military with  id, and 50% off until 9/9/14.  unheard of.  truly great americans!!

data.title: very good take a way pizza
data.text:
Ordered 3 pizzas for five people.  More than enough.  We ordered the Manhattan, the Bronx and a pepperoni.

We phoned our order in and was ready in 20mins for collection.

One comment was that the sauce on the base could have had a more distinct flavor.

data.title: If I could give 10 stars... I would
data.text: Best NY style pizza in San Clemente... hands down. The Brooklyn is our family favorite. They also give military members 50% off which is just unheard of. Great guys working behind the counter. Not a whole lot of place to sit and eat.... so just pick up and head down del mar and eat it on the beach while watching the sunset... you're in san clemente!!! :)
